website_summaries.verdict: An infield glove that delivers amazing versatility.
pros: Comes with an adjustable wrist strap to ensure a custom fit
Deep, wide pocket helps ballplayers secure ground balls, line drives, and pop-ups
Designed to go straight to the field with no break-in required
cons: Some users complain that the glove needs more cushioning

customer_reviews.title: Note the product description closely before ordering:
customer_reviews.text: The Franklin Sports Pro-Flex glove is a very good glove, but I did not note that it was a "youth" model. I could not get my hand in it at all! The glove feels broken in, and this was why I had picked it, I wanted to start using it right away, to help my grandson with his pitching. It is a good glove for a young player to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Mayugazulu2Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT AN ADULT GLOVE!
customer_reviews.text: This glove is listed under "Unisex-Adult" but it's a youth glove. I am an average 5'11" adult male and the 12.5" glove does not fit my hand. Very frustrating, this is the 2nd glove I've bought through Amazon that's incorrectly listed as adult.
customer_reviews.author: C. Liu

customer_reviews.title: it is not hard to break in.
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this glove. especially that it did not take long to break in.
customer_reviews.author: cesar

customer_reviews.title: What an awesome glove. I'm so impressed by the feel and ...
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome glove. I'm so impressed by the feel and comfortability of this glove. Outstanding feel makes it seem like a high end glove with a mid tier price. I have yet to find a better glove for cheaper. This is the best bang for your buck. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Tha Scarecro

customer_reviews.title: Terrible pocket ! Horrible for infielder use.
customer_reviews.text: Glove is soft enough, bendable and a good price. However, the webbed pocket makes it horrible to get the ball out of glove. Fingers get stuck in the webbing. Comes in slightly smaller size without webbing, but needed the 13.5 inch size for better fit. This glove should only be made with closed pocket. Most players these days whether for recreational use or hard core travel ball or college ball play more than one position. Need the the flexibility for variable positions. Should have returned it, but wanted to give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Pam B.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality glove.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this glove for a game I was going to, didnt think much of it as it was only meant to be a quick replacement for my other glove that Ieft behind in a move. But it really is a quality glove.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McCoy

customer_reviews.title: No break in time needed!
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to put it into use, but it feels great and really doesn't need any breaking in. I am looking forward to seeing how I do. It's been a long time since I've played baseball.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Very good looking glove.
customer_reviews.text: Great product very soft and also very good looking glove. I’m not a beisball expert but I use it to practice with my little son and it works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this glove. Not a lot of breaking in needed
customer_reviews.author: Cindi

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Excellent glove. Amazingly Affordable while still being excellent quality. Very very pleasantly surprised. Easy to break in the leather as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: This is a great quality mitt Very flexible no need to spend weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality mitt Very flexible no need to spend weeks breakingnit in. My son loves this mitt.
customer_reviews.author: Hoop

customer_reviews.title: It needs more cushioning. Material isnt strong to last ...
customer_reviews.text: It needs more cushioning. Material isnt strong to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Received the wrong glove. If I get the correct one I will change my rating accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s too small. I’m gonna have to reorder. But I have no bad words. You are awesome
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Good price. A little smaller than i hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Decent glove. Good price. A little smaller than i hoped for. Overall a good glove.
customer_reviews.author: carlos alatorre

customer_reviews.title: The glove is to small.
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely should not be advertised as an adult glove.
customer_reviews.author: Oronde N.

customer_reviews.title: ... not quite broke in enough but still way way better than buying one not broken in at
customer_reviews.text: was not quite broke in enough but still way way better than buying one not broken in at all
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: This is definelty a youth glove
customer_reviews.text: I have fairly large hands and this wasn't even close to fitting. I gave it to my 12 year old and it fit him perfect.
customer_reviews.author: daniel lacroix

customer_reviews.title: It's reasonably soft, but still needs considerable breaking in
customer_reviews.text: Not very easy to give a well tested review in Minnesota in the middle of winter, but nonetheless this is a pretty nice glove. It's reasonably soft, but still needs considerable breaking in I feel. I also found it a little small, I expected it to be a snug fit as it's brand new, but it's certainly a better fit for a teen, or someone with smaller hands. Nice color, and pattern, and full pocket. It's a hybrid, so only leather on the palm area, the rest is PVC type material, but it's well finished. Overall I gave it a solid 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Andyboff66

customer_reviews.title: flexible! Fits my small hand well
customer_reviews.text: I have fond memories of playing catch with my dad growing up, and wanted to begin that with my kids. My own mitt was destroyed in a small basement flood years back, so I needed a starter mitt that I would not need to fuss with and oil to break in. This was a good option, with soft, flexible leather that feels great and fit well upon my first try-on. I wear a small unisex glove for gardening, and the 11.5 inch fit me well.
customer_reviews.author: Gen of North Coast Gardening

customer_reviews.title: We Like It So Far!
customer_reviews.text: We really like this 12.5 inch glove. The leather is soft and supple and it fits a teenage boy's hand just right. Since it is adjustable (with the Velcro strap), it fits my adult hand as well. We like the look of this glove - black with brown stitching. It says it is broken in already, which is partially true. Of course you still have to play with it a bunch to get it broken in like you want it, but the glove isn't stiff at all. We played catch with it and it works just fine! Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Shane Lems

customer_reviews.title: Nice cowhide (inside) glove
customer_reviews.text: This glove weighs one-pound. It’s quite lightweight. The inside is soft cowhide. The outside is “PU leather”, a material made with a split leather backing covered with a layer of polyurethane (hence the term "PU leather"). The inside is soft. There is a wide Velcro wrist strap for adjustment. This 12.5 glove is for smaller hands. My adult hand will barely fit, but it’s not very comfortable for me. This glove is Made in China.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hearn

customer_reviews.title: Comes Super Flexible
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had this glove when I was younger, it comes incredibly flexible, no break in needed, and its super comfy. Durability and quality of materials feels good, no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: MrE

customer_reviews.title: Good glove!
customer_reviews.text: Great glove, well constructed, leather and man-made material but it's a nice glove. We have it for Grandpa and our 2 young grandsons to play catch in the backyard-it's fun for them! Grandpa really does like the glove, it's lite-weight and broken in, almost. Not sure of the life expectancy of it but we think some time.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Great glove
customer_reviews.text: This is a great glove. It is very well made. The stitching is solid and in all the right places. It fits comfortably on my hand and absorbs a good amount of force. It stays on well and is soft. Overall, It's a very nice glove, high quality glove.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: strong and sturdy quality
customer_reviews.text: Soft interior, already broken in, and the stitching and seams are tight and sturdy. This is an ideal glove for a right-hander. An extra bonus is the velcro strap around the wrist to alter the snug fit as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Todd B. Kashdan

customer_reviews.title: Durable and ready to use baseball glove
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic glove that comes already somewhat softened and therefore ready for use. The Velcro strap makes for easy adjusting when putting on the glove. The threading is strong and sturdy and should provide a lot of use before this glove needs to be retired. The pocket is deep enough but not overly large and the interior feels comfortable to the hand.
customer_reviews.author: bronx book nerd

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Quality Fielders Glove.
customer_reviews.text: First I must say I received this Franklin Sports Pro Flex Right Hand Throw Glove, 12 1/2-Inch, Black/Brown free as part of Amazon's Vine program, witch is designed to generate reviews of new products. Yea I am old but I still play catch or a pick up baseball game in the summer when I can. This Franklin Sports Pro Flex Right Hand Throw Glove, 12 1/2-Inch, Black/Brown is really nice, my old one well was getting to old. This glove is pre broken in, so you can receive it put and on and get to playing. It looks to be a very good quality glove ad I can highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Cappetto

customer_reviews.title: Good Glove
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, good size, well made. 12.5 inches. Made partly of leather. Nice stitching, seams, soft material. Looks like it will hold up well. Perfect glove for baseball.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Amazing glove Very well made Great for daddy son baseball time My husband and son are very happy
customer_reviews.author: ColeTan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Molds well to the right fit. We like Franklin for gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice glove
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice,well made glove. A little tight and the assertion that there is no break-in needed isn’t quite accurate, but all in all a good glove!
customer_reviews.author: Oceania

customer_reviews.title: Nice glove, seems well made.
customer_reviews.text: Nice glove, comes pretty flexible so didn’t have to do anything. Son likes it.
customer_reviews.author: A4Q96

product_meta.title: Franklin Sports Pro Flex Hybrid Series Baseball Gloves
product_meta.description: Outfielders will love playing with this Franklin Sports® adult Pro Flex® Hybrid Series 12.5" baseball glove. It combines a durable cowhide leather palm with a PU-laminated PVC hybrid back, and an adjustable wrist strap promises a customized fit. Best of all, this glove can go directly to the field since there's no break-in required.
feature_bullets: DURABILITY: These baseball gloves combine a premium cowhide palm with a PU-Laminated PVC hybrid shell
ADJUSTABLE: The adjustable wrist strap provides a custom and versatile fit
FAST PLAY: Specially treated to go from the store to the playing field with no break-in required
VERSATILE: These gloves are perfect for baseball, softball, and t-ball play
SIZE: 13.5" H-Web design features a deeper, wider pocket to help secure fly balls

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
